name: IMMZ.DT.21.SeasonalInfluenza
description: If child or person has not been vaccinated, give Seasonal Influenza vaccine at 6 months of age, and then once a year.

action.title: Immunize Patient for Seasonal influenza - No Doses at 6 months old
action.description: Provide Seasonal influenza immunizations – using the "Seasonal influenza vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS"

expression.description: "Seasonal influenza vaccine immunization history" = "No-doses" and "Patient age" >= "6 months"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Seasonal influenza because no doses at 6 months old

action.title: Immunize Patient for Seasonal influenza - 1st Dose given 4 weeks ago
action.description: Provide Seasonal influenza immunizations – using the "Seasonal influenza vaccine immunization – 1 PREVIOUS"

expression.description: "Seasonal influenza vaccine immunization history" = "1 dose" and "Last dose given" >= "4 weeks ago" and "Patient age" < "9 years"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Seasonal influenza because 1st dose was given 4 weeks ago

action.title: Immunize Patient for Seasonal influenza - Yearly booster dose
action.description: Provide Seasonal influenza immunizations – using the "Seasonal influenza vaccine immunization – Yearly booster dose"

expression.description: "Seasonal influenza vaccine immunization last dose given" >= "1 year ago"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Seasonal influenza - Yearly booster dose
